title: 2013년 Larry Wayne Adams v. State 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Larry Wayne Adams v. State
**판결일**: 2013-09-11
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약

                    In The
              Court of Appeals
Sixth Appellate District of Texas at Texarkana


                  No. 06-13-00016-CR



         LARRY WAYNE ADAMS, Appellant

                            V.

           THE STATE OF TEXAS, Appellee



          On Appeal from the 3rd District Court
               Anderson County, Texas
                Trial Court No. 30793




       Before Morriss, C.J., Carter and Moseley, JJ.
        Memorandum Opinion by Justice Moseley
                            MEMORANDUM OPINION
         Although the State had charged Larry Wayne Adams with both intoxication manslaughter

and manslaughter, the Anderson County jury1 found him not guilty of intoxication manslaughter

but convicted him of manslaughter with a deadly weapon finding. See TEX. PENAL CODE ANN.

§ 19.04 (West 2011). The trial court, whom Adams elected to assess punishment, assessed

punishment at and sentenced Adams to twenty years’ imprisonment. Adams’ sole issue on

appeal is that the verdict “is not supported by constitutionally sufficient evidence.” 2

         In evaluating legal sufficiency, we review all the evidence in the light most favorable to

the judgment of the trier of fact to determine whether any rational jury could have found the

essential elements of the offense to have been proved beyond a reasonable doubt. Brooks v.

State, 323 S.W.3d 893, 912 (Tex. Crim. App. 2010). Our rigorous legal sufficiency review

focuses on the quality of the evidence pr...
